predictit.test_data.data_test module¶

Test data definition. Data can be pickled and saved on disk. User can create own test data and use compare_models to find best models.

predictit.test_data.data_test.gen_random(n)[source]¶

Generate random test data of length.

Parameters

n (int) – Length of data.

Returns

Random test data.

Return type

np.ndarray

predictit.test_data.data_test.gen_sign(n)[source]¶

Generate test data of length n in signum shape.

Parameters

n (int) – Length of data.

Returns

Signum shaped data.

Return type

np.ndarray

predictit.test_data.data_test.gen_sin(n)[source]¶

Generate test data of length n in sinus shape.

Parameters

n (int) – Length of data.

Returns

Sinus shaped data.

Return type

np.ndarray
